scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run copy-assets
scripts.minify: npm run clean && npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist/assets/css dist/assets/js dist/assets/images dist/assets/fonts
scripts.minify-css: minify assets/css/about.css -o dist/assets/css/about.css && minify assets/css/contact.css -o dist/assets/css/contact.css && minify assets/css/footer.css -o dist/assets/css/footer.css && minify assets/css/general.css -o dist/assets/css/general.css && minify assets/css/hero.css -o dist/assets/css/hero.css && minify assets/css/layout.css -o dist/assets/css/layout.css && minify assets/css/navigation.css -o dist/assets/css/navigation.css && minify assets/css/projects.css -o dist/assets/css/projects.css
scripts.minify-js: minify assets/js/projects.js -o dist/assets/js/projects.js && minify assets/js/nav.js -o dist/assets/js/nav.js && minify assets/js/skills.js -o dist/assets/js/skills.js
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r assets/images dist/assets/ && cp -r assets/fonts dist/assets/
